# Min Int32

> Minimum signed 32-bit integer.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

```javascript
var INT32_MIN = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int32-min' );
```

#### INT32_MIN

Minimum signed 32-bit integer.

```javascript
var bool = ( INT32_MIN === -2147483648 );
// returns true
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

## Examples

<!-- TODO: better example -->

```javascript
var INT32_MIN = require( '@stdlib/constants/math/int32-min' );

console.log( INT32_MIN );
// => -2147483648
```
